text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's the day of the Tracen Academy<n>tryouts—an event where
debut<n>hopefuls show off their racing talents<n>in the hopes
of being scouted.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As the morning of the big day arrives,<n>I quickly head toward
the course to<n>find...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh? You must be... the lost trainer I<n>met the other day?
choice_data_list:
I'm kind of embarrassed to be remembered like
that...

I'm kind of embarrassed to be remembered like
that...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe, forgive me. I couldn't help<n>it—that was quite a
memorable day.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I presume you're here to watch the<n>tryouts? I'll be running
in the final<n>group, so I'd be happy if you stay to<n>see it.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Well, I must be off to get prepared.<n>It's rather sunny today,
so do take<n>care to keep in the shade.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Grass Wonder still has that serene<n>tone as she heads
towards the track<n>with a tranquil smile on her face.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The races fly by, moving swiftly from<n>one to the next.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ahhh! My group's up next... I-I'm so<n>nervous!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha! Spe, you need to loosen up.<n>Careful, or you'll turn
to stone before<n>the race starts, ya know?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Stone?! I-I won't be able to run very<n>well like that!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: It's all right, Spe. Remain calm... Stay<n>relaxed...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Remember, "Do your best and let the<n>heavens do the rest."
You've trained<n>with all your might for this day, have<n>you
not?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
You need only trust in yourself, run<n>true to your heart, and
the outcome<n>will surely be glorious.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Aw, Grass! Thank you!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Think nothing of it... Hm?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Ummm... El? Might I ask you to move<n>over?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Qué? Uh, like this?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: What's this about, Grass? ...Whoa!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In the next moment, a racer loses<n>control on the turn and
hurtles off the<n>track straight towards them!

text_block_list.name: Racer
text_block_list.text: Oh nooooo! Gosh, sorry!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Are you hurt? You should have<n>someone check on you, to
be safe.

text_block_list.name: Racer
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I will... I'm really sorry about<n>that!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Uh, take care now...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Dios mío! She almost scared me to<n>death!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
But, Grass, that was amazing! I don't<n>know how you could
stay so calm!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Hehe, it's nothing. I'm simply glad El<n>wasn't injured.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
That's Grass Wonder, right? This is<n>such an important day,
but she's<n>totally chill! That mindset of hers could<n>be a
killer weapon.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
She's not just mentally strong...<n>Judging from her record,
she's a<n>force to be reckoned with. No wonder<n>she's the
most anticipated in the final<n>group.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While Grass Wonder draws eyes<n>from all around, the time
for her race<n>finally begins!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Continuing to hold everyone's<n>attention, she calmly sticks
to the<n>middle pack, as if waiting to see how<n>the race will
turn out, until...

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, Grass Wonder just jumped<n>out front! But... isn't her
running<n>kinda... strange?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I think the racer alongside her got<n>shaky. Look at the
course—it's in bad<n>shape after that last race.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
It looks like Grass Wonder ran up<n>ahead to avoid a potential
collision.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Grass Wonder's in the lead with only<n>200 meters to go! The
competition's<n>not far behind!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Can she stay ahead?! And the winner<n>is...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In the end, Grass Wonder was ahead<n>until the last moment,
but lost it by a<n>nose, finishing second.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Hey, nice work, Grass! You, well...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh, how unfortunate! I lost it by a<n>mere step.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
But this experience will serve me<n>well. I will endeavor to
make the next<n>race a first-place victory.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Uh, y-yeah! Let's both try real hard!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
What a bummer for Grass. Without<n>that hiccup in the middle,
I bet she had<n>the skills to pull off first place!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
But that blink-of-the-eye response<n>was brilliant. I'd love to
have her on<n>the team!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite the final result, everyone<n>seems impressed by
Grass's<n>performance. I'm sure she'll get<n>plenty of
trainers coming to scout her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: At least, that's what I thought...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Grass!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh, El? What's the matter?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Training tonight? I'd be up to join<n>you.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I think not... Today's race has taken a<n>toll on me, so I plan
on resting up.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: If you'll excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Not long after, a certain rumor began<n>to spread around the
academy.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: "Grass Wonder turns down every<n>single scouting offer."
